review: Pretty incredible product.  Very easy to install, unlike most other tv interface devices.  And it's really easy to operate.
author: James L. "JIm"

review: Great I watched 3 movies got money back
author: Louis Iovino

review: Easy to set up, low profile, works exactly as described. I use prime a lot, and this is a great way to access my favorite programs quickly.
author: Kathi R

review: Love the firestick.  The electrical connection is a bit of a pain because I already have enough wires around my tv, though.  The photos and ads kind of don't show the necessary power cord.  However, as far as the actual services delivered, it is great!  Love the fact that it is already to use with my Amazon Prime membership for all of the extras available.  Makes the Prime membership more valuable.
author: Cat-happy in NY

review: Compact!Simple!Very little loading times!Very limited in channels.Amazon Prime is pitiful compared to Netflix.
author: Bill Jones
